alert.note: Alert for Butts; Crawford; Lamar; Monroe; Pike; Spalding; Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 8:50PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Spalding, southeastern Pike, western Monroe, Upson, Butts, northwestern Crawford, northeastern Talbot and Lamar Counties through 915 PM EST... At 850 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Orchard Hill to Sprewell Bluff State Park, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Barnesville, Jackson, Forsyth, Flovilla, Milner, Yatesville, Orchard Hill, Meansville, Culloden, Aldora, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, The Rock, Atwater, Walker Mill, Russellville, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Logtown and Blount. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Crawford; Lamar; Monroe; Pike; Spalding; Talbot; Upson
